title: Garage Zhuge: Drivers’ Dreams
alternative_title: Zhu Ge Che Fang: Che Shou Meng ; Zhuge Garage: Dreams of Drivers ; Zhū Gé Chē Fáng: Chē Shǒu Mèng ; 诸葛车房：车手梦
status: Zhu Ge Che Fang: Che Shou Meng ; Zhuge Garage: Dreams of Drivers ; Zhū Gé Chē Fáng: Chē Shǒu Mèng ; 诸葛车房：车手梦
description:
Description :
        Garage Zhuge: Drivers' Dreams[KK Original Contribution Plan] Xiaoguang, who loved racing games since childhood, was tortured by work and life and gradually lost himself. By chance, he came into contact with the racing arcade game [Full Speed], and since then he started his career as a racing driver in the virtual world, and found himself in the duel with various drivers. And what kind of challenge will the ghost car that suddenly appeared in front of him bring him?
